subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick proved just how strong his organization is by winning the Nationwide Series race at Bristol Motor Speedway in Tennessee in his own race car. Harvick led for 44 laps in his Chevrolet, owned by Kevin Harvick Inc. It was his first victory in a car fielded by the race team he built with his wife. harvick.
